alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 05 at 10:24PM CST until January 08 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Monroe, Wilcox and Dallas Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 68.0 feet, Millers Ferry Park begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 59.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday morning to a crest of 66.2 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
